scripts.validate: pnpm format:check && pnpm lint:strict && pnpm test:unit
scripts.validate:design: bash -c 'EXIT=0; echo "üé® Checking for design system violations..."; if grep -rE "className.*#[0-9A-Fa-f]{3,6}" apps/web/src --include="*.tsx" --include="*.jsx" 2>/dev/null; then echo "‚ùå VIOLATION: Hardcoded hex colors found"; EXIT=1; fi; if grep -rE "className.*\[oklch\(" apps/web/src --include="*.tsx" --include="*.jsx" 2>/dev/null; then echo "‚ùå VIOLATION: Hardcoded OKLCH values found"; EXIT=1; fi; if grep -rE "(p|m|gap|space)(-[xy])?-\[[0-9]+px\]" apps/web/src --include="*.tsx" --include="*.jsx" 2>/dev/null; then echo "‚ùå VIOLATION: Arbitrary spacing values found"; EXIT=1; fi; if grep -rE "style=\{\{.*(color|backgroundColor|borderColor)" apps/web/src --include="*.tsx" --include="*.jsx" 2>/dev/null; then echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  WARNING: Inline styles with colors found"; fi; if grep -rE "<div[^>]*onClick" apps/web/src --include="*.tsx" --include="*.jsx" 2>/dev/null; then echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  WARNING: Non-semantic interactive elements found"; fi; if [ $EXIT -eq 0 ]; then echo "‚úÖ Design system validation passed"; fi; exit $EXIT'
scripts.docker:reset: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d && node scripts/ensure-docker.js

*.{ts,tsx}: bash -c 'for file in "$@"; do if echo "$file" | grep -qE "apps/web/src/.*\.(tsx|jsx)$"; then if grep -E "className.*#[0-9A-Fa-f]{3,6}" "$file" 2>/dev/null; then echo "‚ùå VIOLATION in $file: Hardcoded hex colors"; exit 1; fi; if grep -E "className.*\[oklch\(" "$file" 2>/dev/null; then echo "‚ùå VIOLATION in $file: Hardcoded OKLCH values"; exit 1; fi; if grep -E "(p|m|gap|space)(-[xy])?-\[[0-9]+px\]" "$file" 2>/dev/null; then echo "‚ùå VIOLATION in $file: Arbitrary spacing"; exit 1; fi; fi; done' --
